title: How to activate a phone number with Verizon - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are trying to add a phone to your account you can do that on their website.  If you are trying to "Port" a number from another carrier you'll need to go to a Verizon Store.  They will send an electronic port request to the other carrier and through some wizbang magic your number can then be assigned to a line on Verizon's network.
